ing: 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (9 inch) angel food cake, cut in cubes
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a very light dessert recipe from my friend, Ellen.  It is so easy to make and is the perfect ending to a heavy meal."
ins: Prepare pudding with milk according to package directions.  In a trifle bowl or other glass serving dish, layer half the cake pieces, half the pudding, half the bananas, half the strawberries and half the whipped topping.  Repeat layers.  Cover and chill in refrigerator 4 hours before serving.
